Detailed Description

template<class T>
struct BinaryTree< T >::node

A node struct containing a left and right pointer as well as data.

This is the node that is used by the program, there is a left and right pointer as well as data of the templated data type defined by the user. The height of the node is also stored in this struct Contains a constructor.
